name: BulletBall
description:
BulletBall is an intense top-down shooter with only one bullet. Take down enemies in a dodgeball-like firefight while fighting over a single piece of ammo, BulletBall was made for the 2019 GMTK Game Jam.

How to Play:

Green Bullet = Hurts enemies, safe for player

Red Bullet = Hurts player,  safe for enemies

Fire - [LMB]

Catch Bullet - [RMB]

Move - [WASD]

Restart Level - [SPACE]
